data.title: List of Approved Seminaries
data.meta_description:
Effective July 1, 2024, the University Senate has approved these seminaries for students pursuing ordination in The United Methodist Church.  

United Methodist Seminaries 

Allows fully online Master of Divinity degree program.  *Boston University School of Theology
745 Commonwealth Avenue
Boston, MA 02215
(617) 353-3050

*Candler School of Theology of Emory University 
Rita Anne Rollins Building
1531 Dickey Drive
Atlanta,
data.meta_site_name: General Board of Higher Education and Ministry
data.text:
General Conference 2024

Learn how changes in the world, church, academy, and our communities of faith have required GBHEM adapt to more effectively engage the needs of those we serve as well as clarify and support the work of our ministry partners.
